Hey, you could host a site here. I saw on github you have some computer art program. I couldn't get it to run for me, but if you are using it regualarly, you could host some of its artworks on a site here and link to the code. This way you'd increase zeronet content, and you show off some of your software's results, potentially making people curious to try it out.
